module.name: daemontools
module.summary: Collection of tools for managing UNIX services

interface.name: daemontools_ipc_domain
interface.summary: An ipc channel between the supervised domain and svc_start_t

interface.name: daemontools_service_domain
interface.summary: Define a specified domain as a supervised service.

param.name: entrypoint
param.summary: The type associated with the process program.

interface.name: daemontools_read_svc
interface.summary: Allow a domain to read svc_svc_t files.

interface.name: daemontools_manage_svc
interface.summary: Allow a domain to create svc_svc_t files.
